newsitem.title: USA: Fortune Brands unit, Gel settle patent suit.
newsitem.headline: Fortune Brands unit, Gel settle patent suit.

text.p: Acushnet Co, a unit of Fortune Brands Inc, said Tuesday that it has signed a settlement agreement with privately-held Gel Sciences Inc, ending a patent dispute between the two companies.

Under the terms of the agreement, said Acushnet, both companies are ending litigation and have agreed to cross-license certain of their worldwide patent rights to temperature responsive gel materials and technology.

James Connor, executive vice president of Acushnet's Foot-Joy brand, said, "This settlement agreement removes the uncertainty which has inhibited the Acushnet Company from actively pursuing development and commercialization of its thermal responsive gel technology."
